# Battle

- [launch](#launch)
---

## Launch

When a user client receives this response it should launch the game (spring.exe) with the start script.

- Endpoint Type: **Event**
- Source: **Server**
- Target: **User**
- Requires Role: `tachyon.lobby`

### Event

JSONSchema

```json
{
    "$id": "battle.launch.event",
    "scopes": [
        "tachyon.lobby"
    ],
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "type": {
            "const": "event",
            "type": "string"
        },
        "messageId": {
            "type": "string"
        },
        "commandId": {
            "const": "battle/launch",
            "type": "string"
        },
        "data": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "script": {
                    "type": "string"
                }
            },
            "required": [
                "script"
            ]
        }
    },
    "required": [
        "type",
        "messageId",
        "commandId",
        "data"
    ]
}
```
<details>
<summary>Example</summary>

```json
{
    "type": "event",
    "messageId": "quis",
    "commandId": "battle/launch",
    "data": {
        "script": "quis"
    }
}
```
</details>
